Quote_Text: Then why all the fuss? Why the rush to protect marriage, if as you say, it is a rare thing? BTW I correct people when they see my ring, and assume I am a heterosexual.
Response_Text: Gay marriage is an abomination and eventually brings God's disfavor and even judgment on men and nations.

Quote_Text: Gay marriage is an abomination and eventually brings God's disfavor and even judgment on men and nations.
Response_Text: Your religious beliefs should not curtail my civil freedoms or my religious liberty.

Response_Text: God is going to curtail your carnal hedonism at some point, if we don't. In the mean time your Sodom and Gomorrah circus side-show is an affront to God-fearing people everywhere.
